Body: So my cousins gave me a phone and she forgot to take the password off so since she wasnt responding with the passowrd i got in paitent and i went on and reset the phone by holding all 3 buttons up volume , home button , and lock button so as i did that i reset the phone but as soon as i turned the phone back on it asked me to agree terms and conditions : End User License Agreement i hit agree and then it askes me to put in an gmail account in order to use the phone and i do so and it takes me right back to End User License Agreement after i already hit agree and then the cycle repeats its self please help me
Title: Please Help me : Samsung MetroPCS

history.Text: So my cousins gave me a phone and she forgot to take the password off so since she wasnt responding with the passowrd i got in paitent and i went on and reset the phone by holding all 3 buttons up volume , home button , and lock button so as i did that i reset the phone but as soon as i turned the phone back on it asked me to agree terms and conditions : End User License Agreement i hit agree and then it askes me to put in an gmail account in order to use the phone and i do so and it takes me right back to End User License Agreement after i already hit agree and then the cycle repeats its self please help me
